caption.p: Effects of the inhaled Origanum majorana essential oil (1%OmEO (III) and 3%OmEO (IV)) on apoptotic state in the rat hippocampal homogenates of the Aβ1-42-treated rats. Values are means ± S.E.M. ( n = 3 animals per group). Statistical significance was determined by one-way ANOVA. For Tukey’s post hoc analyses: Sham (I) vs. Aβ1-42 (II): *** p = 0.0008. The rate of apoptosis reflects n-fold nucleosomes enrichment and it is shown on the Y axis.
